1.text: And Benjamin begat Bela his first-born, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,

2.text: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.

3.text: And there are sons to Bela: Addar, and Gera,

4.text: and Abihud, and Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,

5.text: and Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.

6.text: And these are sons of Ehud: they are heads of fathers to the inhabitants of Geba, and they remove them unto Manahath;

7.text: and Naaman, and Ahiah, and Gera, he removed them, and begat Uzza and Ahihud.

8.text: And Shaharaim begat in the field of Moab, after his sending them away; Hushim and Baara are his wives.

9.text: And he begetteth of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,

10.text: and Jeuz, and Shachiah, and Mirmah. These are his sons, heads of fathers.

11.text: And of Hushim he begat Ahitub and Elpaal.

12.text: And sons of Elpaal: Eber, and Misheam, and Shamer, (he built Ono and Lod and its small towns),

13.text: and Beriah and Shema, (they are the heads of fathers to the inhabitants of Aijalon—they caused to flee the inhabitants of Gath),

15.text: and Zebadiah, and Arad, and Ader,

16.text: and Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, sons of Beriah,

17.text: and Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,

18.text: and Ishmerai, and Jezliah, and Jobab, sons of Elpaal;

19.text: And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,

20.text: and Elienai, and Zillethai, and Eliel,

21.text: and Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, sons of Shimei;

22.text: And Ishpan, and Heber, and Eliel,

23.text: and Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,

24.text: and Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,

25.text: and Iphedeiah, and Penuel, sons of Shashak;

26.text: And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,

27.text: and Jaareshiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, sons of Jeroham.

28.text: These are heads of fathers, by their generations, heads; these dwelt in Jerusalem.

29.text: And in Gibeon hath the father of Gibeon dwelt, and the name of his wife is Maachah;

30.text: and his son, the first-born, is Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,

31.text: and Gedor, and Ahio, and Zacher;

32.text: and Mikloth begat Shimeah. And they also over-against their brethren dwelt in Jerusalem with their brethren.

33.text: And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchi-Shua, and Abinadab, and Esh-Baal.

34.text: And a son of Jonathan is Merib-Baal, and Merib-Baal begat Micah;

35.text: and sons of Micah: Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz:

36.text: and Ahaz begat Jehoadah, and Jehoadah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza,

37.text: and Moza begat Binea, Raphah is his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.

38.text: And to Azel are six sons, and these are their names: Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these are sons of Azel.

39.text: And sons of Eshek his brother: Ulam his first-born, Jehush the second, and Eliphelet the third.

40.text: And the sons of Ulam are men mighty in valour, treading bow, and multiplying sons and son’s sons, a hundred and fifty. All these are of the sons of Benjamin.
